content: before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before ​ marker k2tog k1 round 2 k all stitches around ​ repeat rounds 1 and 2 an additional 5 6 7 times until you have 20 20 20 stitches ​ ​ remaining or until desired length use kitchener stitch to graft your toe together -
